snippet: A U.S. doctor infected with the Ebola virus in West Africa has continued to show progress at the Nebraska Medical Centre where he was taken last week, the hospital said on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: Nebraska Ebola Patient Showing More Progress - Hospital
headline.main: Nebraska Ebola Patient Showing More Progress - Hospital

lead_paragraph: A U.S. doctor infected with the Ebola virus in West Africa has continued to show progress at the Nebraska Medical Centre where he was taken last week, the hospital said on Wednesday.
